attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: I can’t even begin to describe how bad this app is. every time I try to open it it crashes or my phone begins to freeze and I’m not able to get back to my home screen. my phones been slower since downloading this app. do not download!!

attributes.title: Really.
attributes.review: It took 5 days to download and when I got it it wouldn’t load for another 7 days, then when it loaded the content didn’t load for another 3 days. Then I was so disappointed by the content I threw up and cried, deleted the app, and cried some more

attributes.title: Orange🍊  figure
attributes.review: This orange figured it was scary I had nightmares for weeks and then I started to notice it was my sleep paralysis I had to sleep in my pants room because of this hideous creature 1/10 but not get from the App Store it’s terrifying 😪😰😓😬   have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙂a friend👧then😪just😾for🤦the🗣clout👀they’ll😈do😣it😕again🙄

attributes.title: Soy Disappointed 😔😔😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting to learn reliable and resourceful information about Trump but only saw a scary orange man on the screen and blatant lies?? I do not appreciate this type of scare from a “news” app. Had to leave a review about the traumatizing experience. Should not be on the App Store 👎

attributes.title: Traumatized
attributes.review: I downloaded the app with high hopes but unfortunately was immediately shocked. As soon as I clicked on it a very disturbing image appeared. I experienced nightmares for 2 weeks and am still trying to recover. I do not recommend this app unless you want nightmares as well. #shockedanddisturbed

attributes.title: Hot garbo
attributes.review: Really laggy, kicked me off a bunch and took like a week to install?? I don’t understand why the app is so low quality. I assume the president of the United States would expect better- maybe if I were still in the White House’s administration this wouldn’t have happened.

attributes.title: Unfair
attributes.review: It is no doubt that this app will display Trump’s motives for America but the information is portrayed in the most biased way. On top of that, the app would crash every 5 minutes. I’ve redownloaded it multiple times but there seems to be a glitch or something.
